title: Warrior
contents: text | If another warrior is one space away they both get an ATK boost of +1
description | This warrior has trained for countless hours to become one of the best |

title: Archer
contents: description | This archer is able to hit an enemy from far away. He likes to spend his free time hunting in the woods |

title: Medic
contents: text | If any healing ability is used by Medic on another piece, the effect is doubled.
description | This is a person highly skilled in medicine and healing arts |

title: Blacksmith
contents: description | This blacksmith has made many weapons. He has mastered his skill and is able to repair most weapons |

title: Ranger
contents: text | Everytime you attack you have a chance of doing 2 times the damage(How To Play Card 5)
description | This person is highly skilled with a gun. He is an amazing sharp shooter |

title: Mage
contents: description | This person has spent hours on end studying the magic arts. They can do high ranking spells that many dream of doing |

title: Potion
contents: text | Heals 5 HP to applied troop

title: HOW TO PLAY PART 1
contents: text | A turn consists of a movement, an attack, and spells.
bullet | ATK this is how much damage you do to an enemy piece
bullet | STA This is how many spaces you can move in one turn
bullet | RNG This is how many spaces away your piece can hit an enemy
bullet | MAG This is the level of Spells you can cast. Only one per turn

title: Shortsword
contents: text | When Equipped to a creature, add 2 ATK to that creature

title: HOW TO PLAY PART 2
contents: property | ATK -| ATK or attack is how much damage your piece does. A piece can attack once per turn. ATK stats can even be raised by spells or items (Ex. The item Shortsword can be used to raise a pieces attack by 2.)

property | STA -| STA or Stamina is how many spaces your piece can move each turn. There are spells and items that can replenish most or even all of your stamina for that turn (Ex. the item Brew of Endurance will let you be able to move again that turn, This can be useful for evading an enemy attack.)

title: HOW TO PLAY PART 3
contents: property | RNG -| RNG or Range is the distance you can hit someone from. (Ex. if an enemy piece is 3 spaces away the archer(base RNG of 3) would be able to hit it but a warrior(base RNG of 1) would not be able to.

property | MAG -| MAG or Magic is the level of spell you can cast. (Ex. A mage (Base MAG of 5) would be able to summon the spell Stopwatch (Magic cost of 4) but a blacksmith (Base MAG of 0) would not be able to cast it.
property | HP | HP or Health is the amount of damage you can take before your piece dies.

title: Stopwatch
contents: text | You or an enemy piece will have to return back to their previous move.

title: Magic Text Book
contents: text | When equipped to a piece, that piece gets +2 magic.

title: HOW TO PLAY PART 4
contents: property | Consumable -| These items can be used whenever you want. Once you use them, they are not usable for the entire game.
property | Equipable - | These items can only be used during your turn. They are equipped with one piece and stay on it until you unequip it or an unequipment spell is cast.
property | Basic - | These spells can be cast only on your turn.
property | Fast - | These spells can be used whenever you want.

title: Thief
contents: text | If this thief is next to an enemy with an equipped item. you have a chance to steal that item. (See How To Play Card 6)
description | This thief has grown up to love taking from others |

title: HOW TO PLAY PART 6
contents: property | Warrior| <u>Battlecry</u> - If multiple warriors are next to each other then each one gets +1 ATK.
property | Medic | <u>First Aid</u> - If a medic is healing another piece that ability is multiplied by 2.
property | Thief | <u>Sneak</u> - If a thief is stealing from an enemy piece, Roll a dice, if 3 or up it was successful, if lower, then you lose and take 3 damage.
property | Ranger | <u>Headshot</u> - Everytime you attack, roll a dice. If you roll a two, then do twice the damage you would normaly do.

title: HOW TO PLAY PART 5
contents: property | Bound - | These are spells that are cast onto a piece. They can only be removed when that piece dies or by another spell.

title: Bandits
contents: text | This piece is unable to use any items.
description | Know thy self, know thy enemy. A thousand battles, a thousand victories  |

title: Custom Player
contents: description | Sometimes life can be based on the toss of a dice.. |

title: HOW TO PLAY PART 7
contents: text | The custom player card is exactly as it sounds. The only thing is the stats are based off the roll of a dice. You will need at least one 6 sided dice, and one 20 sided dice.

property | HP | For HP you have to roll the 6 sided die. if the dice lies over 4, then you will have to roll the 20 sided and the 6 sided dice. based on the sum of what they both landed on that s your HP. If it didn't land on 4 or higher when you first rolled the 6 sided dice alone, then you will only roll the 20 sided dice.
property | STA, MAG, ATK, RNG | Roll the 6 sided dice for each of these stats whatever side it landed on that will be your stats.

title: GAME MASTER CARD
contents: text | As the Game Master, you are in control. You can do whatever you feel is necessary...
text | You will be deciding how the story goes and how the board is placed. You can give the Player(s) different quests. These can range from eliminating enemies to whatever you want.
text | The Player(s) end game is to try to defeat you in becoming the next Game Master.

title: Game Master
contents: property | ABILITY: | Terrain Formation, Summon, Double Chance.
description | I didn't come here to bring peace, but I have come here with a sword |

title: GAME MASTER STATS
contents: property | Terrain Formation - | The Game Master can raise the terrain to block enemy attacks for one turn.
property | Summon - | The Game Master can summon Cosmic Warriors for one turn.

property | Double Chance - | You can roll 2 dice instead of one for any of your stats. But the stats that you roll the next 2 turns loose 2 of what you roll. (If you go into the negatives then you lose that much health.)

title: SUMMONED BASE
contents: text | This piece is unable to use any items.

title: Psychokinesis
contents: text | Move a blockaid to a different location

title: Reflect
contents: text | Enemy's spell is reversed and the caster takes damage.

title: Summon
contents: text | Summon a group of bandits.

title: Crossbow
contents: text | This item can only be used on Archer

title: Lethal Potion
contents: text | Item can only be used if next to an enemy piece.
text | for the next 4 turns the affected piece will lose 1 health per turn.

title: Natures Demise
contents: text | For the next 3 turns the affected piece will take 2 damage per turn.
